thread.title: was very nice, close to the Arc de Triomphe and Champs-Élysées, clean and neat
thread.title_full: was very nice, close to the Arc de Triomphe and Champs-Élysées, clean and neat - Review of Niel Hotel, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: gabby164
title: was very nice, close to the Arc de Triomphe and Champs-Élysées, clean and neat
text:
they have elevator
small but cozy
nice attitude
5-10 minuts from arc the triumph and metro
near a cool small city market so you can buy things in the bakery near it, something from the deli and have a fine meal.
there is a good italian resturant across the street.
i recomend this hotel
i been there at january 2015
